sourcesContent:
<select name="" id="">

    <option selected disabled value="">Select Target Audience</option>
    <option *ngFor="let t of ta" value=""></option>
</select>
import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core';
import TargetAudienceModel from 'src/app/models/targetAudience-model';
import { DataService } from 'src/app/services/data.service';

@Component({
  selector: 'app-list',
  templateUrl: './list.component.html',
  styleUrls: ['./list.component.css']
})
export class ListComponent implements OnInit {

  public targetAudience:TargetAudienceModel[]=[]

  public constructor( private dataSerice:DataService){}



  public async ngOnInit(){
   try {
     this.targetAudience= await this.dataSerice.getAllTargetAudience()

} catch (error) {
  
}
  }



}
